name: Sales And Bank LLC
terms:
"There are no cancellations or refunds once the service is initiated unless explicitly stated otherwise. The document serves as a contract for the provided service, which includes the modification of the software as specified. The service encompasses all agreed upon modifications to the software and associated support to ensure its functionality. Any additional modifications or services not

outlined in the invoice will be subject to separate billing. All terms and conditions apply as per mentioned herein or on our website"


﻿The pricing mentioned in this quotation is applicable for this year only. Renewal pricing is subject to review and may be revised at the time of renewal to reflect changes in operational costs, market conditions, or service enhancements. Any such revisions will be communicated in advance for client approval.
